title: How Many Calories Are in Boba Tea?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in boba tea with a standard 16 oz serving, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for different types.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Boba Tea?
assumptions: Standard 16 oz milk tea with black tapioca pearls, moderate sweetness (about 1/2 sugar), whole milk, no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by shop, size, milk type, sweetness level, and add-ins like fruits or syrups. Check specific labels or apps when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard 16 oz boba tea contains about 400 kcal, mostly from sugars and milk.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use non-dairy milk (e.g., almond) instead of whole milk

faqs.q: How many calories are in boba tea without milk?
faqs.a: A 16 oz black tea boba (no milk) has about 250-300 kcal, mainly from sugar and pearls.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in boba tea?
faqs.a: Around 80 g carbs per 16 oz serving, with 50 g sugars and 2 g fiber from the tapioca.
Typically 5 g per serving from milk; opt for plant-based milks for less or add protein boosts.

faqs.q: How to make boba tea lower in calories?
faqs.a: Choose less sugar, skim milk or non-dairy alternatives, and skip or reduce boba pearls.

faqs.q: Are there healthy boba tea options?
